text: Konstantin Zubov () was a Russian actor, film director. People's Artist of the USSR. == Selected filmography == * 1916 — Nelli Raintseva * 1917 — Revolutionary * 1933 — Marionettes * 1940 — Yakov Sverdlov ==References== == External links == * Константин Зубов on kino-teatr.ru * Category:Russian male film actors Category:20th-century Russian male actors
title: Konstantin Zubov
